attributes.action: Make it law that the father of their child/children has to see them
attributes.background: It should be law that the father of a child/children should have to see them even if it is 1 day a week, but this should be law

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you want to guarantee access to children or require fathers to undertake a minimum amount of contact time.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257930
